sentences.sContent: We wake every morning to the sound of a finch singing.
sentences.sContent_eng: We wake every morning to the sound of a finch singing.
sentences.sCn: 每天早晨醒来时还能听到燕雀的歌唱。

sentences.sContent: One species of finch learned to pick up a cactus needle to poke for insects.
sentences.sContent_eng: One species of finch learned to pick up a cactus needle to poke for insects.
sentences.sCn: 有一种雀科小鸟学会捡起仙人掌针去戳得昆虫猎物。

remMethod.val: 这种鸟可以说是精选 (pick) 出的雀类 (finch)

trans.tranOther: a small bird with a short beak
